name: Artista - Cimarron Connecticut - Toro
additionalNotes: These are the Cimarron Regions of America and the inspiration for Cimarron Cigars. One is a spicy Maduro complimented with hints of earthy sweetness, the other is a mellow Connecticut Shade that enhances notes of cedar, leather, and earth. FeautresÂ sweet cream, summer hay, aged Spanish cedar, and rich leather with a hint of spice on the retrohale.
